scripts.install-projects: npm install && cd ../chat-bot && npm install && cd ../chat-server && npm install && npm run create-test-data && cd ../chat-client && npm install && echo '' && echo PROJECTS INSTALLATION COMPLETED
scripts.start-projects: concurrently "wait-on http://localhost:3001/api && npm run start-chat-client" "npm run start-chat-server" "npm run start-chat-bot"
scripts.install-and-start-projects: npm run install-projects && npm run start-projects
